- **Interests**: Applications of probability, data science, optimization, and mathematics to real-world problems
  
- **Research**: Undergraduate researcher in the <a href="https://ssog.ae.gatech.edu" target="_blank">Space Systems Optimization Group (SSOG)</a> advised by Dr. Koki Ho, Masa Isaji, and Nick Gollins, focusing on Mars rover vehicle routing under uncertainty using optimization with adapative planning to improve mission efficiency and decision-making
